works.description:
i wrote an article on 2nd May 2011 titled 

"50 Awesome tips to write Articles Fast (Really Fast): Part 1"

you can see it at the url mentioned below.

My article is infringed completely at this blog www.magingertz.com on 4th of July 2011.

To add insult to injury, Magingertz article appears at a better google page position than my original article. This blog has other articles which are also taken illegally from bukisa articles.

Magingertz article does not even mention my pen-name (GoldenAsh) as the original writer. It shows my article as written by some one else. It also does not give credits to me.
